mapper.insert: insert into onestoit_notification_employee ( employee_id, create_date, type, case_id, case_name, readed ) values ( #{employeeId}, #{createDate}, #{type}, #{caseId}, #{caseName}, #{readed} )
mapper.update: update onestoit_notification_employee set readed = 1 where id = #{id};
mapper.select: select COUNT(*) from onestoit_notification_employee where employee_id = #{employeeId} and readed = 0;
